data.actual_result: You get an empty gray screen and nothing happens till reload
data.expected_result: It brings you to the keybinds tab like on the app
data.short_description: Clicking the blue clickable text under the Priority Speaker permission brings you to an empty screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on Firefox - Go to server settings - Go to the roles tab - Scroll down on a role's permissions - Click on the blue clickable text that says "Push to Talk (Priority)"
